column2: "I can tell that something is troubling you just by looking at your face!"
"Rest assured, now that I'm here there's nothing to fear! Now, say what troubles you!"
"Hm? There's nothing troubling you? That can't possibly be true... it is?"
"Wow, that made me look stupider than I expected. Time to change the subject!"

"Me? My name is Huey. I'm the sixth of the Council of Six.
...Yep, I'm one of those amazing guys."
"People always tell me I don't act like it, but it's not like there's anything they can do about it, now is there?"
"...Well, it hasn't got in the way of what I do! I help people everywhere I go, and I don't let them complain about it!"
"You seem pretty capable. I hope I get a chance to run into you again!"
